author: Gus_263
title: Shredd
review: Another of the theme of small cars that can throw the minifigures(don't playable, but the only compatible with the cars, made with the base device that can do the minifigure flies and two parts later used on racers)and the piece that makes the car run, with elastic to throw, without this to be used like a garage of the car with the minifigure. The colors are well painted, like the gray, blue and red details. Basically, this isn't very playable, but do the cars run and throw the minifigures is a good thing for competition of sets of the same theme.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Racers (Xalax) - Shredd Review
review:
This set almost doesn't have any play features. The only play features we get is the same as in the other sets of the LEGO Racers (Xalax) theme: The ramp can be used to launch the car and the gray bumper shoots the driver out of the cockpit. The built is very simple and we also get a few stickers for the ramp to put on. This vehicle is very easy to maneuver and it's also a good set to have - even for pieces for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
